data.title: bonjour Continental!
data.text: the continental breakfast was good but small. i had a croissant, a small danish party, fruits and a juice  as part of the continental breakfast ( USD 13) but i had to pay for a hot drink - a tea - when i asked for one and this was a bit surprising. service is good, location and decor very nice.

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to review! Certainly a tea is part of the continental experience and will follow up with the team. Please reach out to me personally as I would love to take care of.

I appreciate your input and it was our pleasure to serve.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Breakfast place.
data.text: We enjoyed getting breakfast here each morning. Good coffee. Great fried eggs, thick bacon and rye toast.

data.title: Great light dinner
data.text: I really enjoyed the peach salad. It was delicious and just what I was looking for at the end of a long travel day. Great service at the bar, the bartender suggested the perfect wine to pair with my dinner. Great experience.

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:

It was our pleasure to serve.

data.title: Pourquoi le Hype
data.text:
Bottom Line: Average food. Excellent ambiance. Service pas tres vite. 

Bizou Brasserie isn't particularly French... but if that's your sticking point you're in for a long search in Tampa. Enjoy the ambiance and the historic building, but don't expect the coq au vin that you were hoping to find. 

Quick Tips:
On street parking only. 

Indoor and outdoor seating available. 

Physically attached to / inside Le Merdien.

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to review! Although our hotel and restaurant name is inspired by our French heritage, Bizou is better known for casual fare with inspired dishes from various regions. Bizou offers valet service as well for $5. Would not rely on street parking but it is an option.

Thank you again and it was our pleasure to serve.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great brunch!
data.text: Here for brunch on a Sunday at 1PM. Good menu, great staff, fabulous surroundings. I had the chicken and waffles which was a fantastic dish, highly recommend it. Will come back here for sure!

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Fantastic! Thank you for taking the time to review our brunch. It has quickly become a brunch of choice when you couple cuisine, historical elements and award winning  service.

It was our pleasure to serve.

Eat well!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Superb Frites!
data.text: Wonderful atmosphere despite there being relatively few diners present. Waiter was friendly and informative. Menu was varied - my Bizou burger with brie was fantastic and others enjoyed the steak frites immensely. The frites were superb indeed. Cocktails were good too.

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Could not agree more! Thank you for taking the time to review! Our frites, along with several items have been well received. Great to hear about your service experience as well.

It was our pleasure to serve.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Historic Charm compliments a Fantastic Menu
data.text: Luxury service with historic charm throughout the remodeled courthouse. The food was fantastic and reasonably priced for a luxury accommodation. Wait staff are dressed in black & white with suspenders - felt like they were old school lawyers serving us for once!

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Perfect review! Thank you for taking the time to share. So many Discovery Moments when you dine in Bizou. Our atmosphere coupled with our cuisine certainly builds loyalty.

It was our pleasure to serve!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A much needed respite from conference hell
data.text:
Where to start? The staff was amazingly friendly. My compliments to the bartender, Heather, who was professional, kind and an amazing mixologist! Her Old Fashioned was only outdone by the Manhattan she made afterwards.

The food was excellent as well. Escargot was served in a classic butter sauce with puff pastry, but the presentation was modern in that the restaurant does not use the standard escargot platter, but provides about 15 snails in a bowl covered by the pastry.

The Brasserie steak was good as well, but the pomme frites made the decent cut all that more flavorful.

The fact that it's in the Le Meridien hotel, which is a converted Federal courthouse built in 1902, only adds to the experience.

Well done!

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Fantastic review! Thank you for taking the time to review. Our crafted cocktails along with our amazing culinary team is passionate about unlocking the destination through our food and beverage. It was our pleasure to serve you.

Eat well!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best Cheeseburger in Tampa
data.text: My husband and I had a fantastic time at Bizou. Everything - from the drinks to the food – were perfect; the  service was flawless as well. The hostess, Courtney, was extremely friendly and welcoming. Our server, Ryan, was top notch – attentive and very good humored. We both had cheeseburgers and could not have been more pleased with them – they were prepared expertly and had generous heaping’s of delicious brie cheese. The side of brussel sprouts was also super tasty. The only thing I would have changed were the French fries – though they were good (great flavor, not too TOO greasy), they were all pretty short and stubby. (I like a decent fry length – fries the length of tator tots are just not as fun to eat. …And this is not a phallic thing in any way…It’s a fry thing.) For dessert we split a slice of incredible carrot cake – the cake was fresh and moist, and served with great cinnamon ice cream. We had several cocktails with our dinner and these were faultless, as well. We couldn’t have had a better time and dinner – we will definitely be back!

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Could not agree more! Our best seller! Not ready to divulge our secrets but it is all in the meat! Great to hear that Courtney made a fantastic impression like many of our amazing associates do each day to help drive loyalty. Ryan is outstanding and always adds to the experience! It was our pleasure to serve you.

Eat well!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Beautiful restaurant, good service and food! Friendly staff!
data.text: I stayed at the Hotel with my daughter so we had lunch and breakfast at Bizou! Very pleasant ! Delicious food. The staff is very friendly and pleasing! Their speciality drinks are amazing!  Will go back! The building itself is just gorgeous as it use to be the old court house! Its pretty cool.

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Incredible! Thank you for taking time to review.  Exceeding the expectation is the goal in all areas. Food, service and atmosphere are the focus points to deliver the memorable experience to drive loyalty.

It was our pleasure to serve.

Eat well!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice historical environment, good food and professional waiter
data.text:
We had a nice dinner at the Bizou when we were staying at the Le Meridien in the same building at the restaurant. This is really a great place to enjoy the evening. The restaurant is situated in the old court room and the cash register in the old witness booth, a cool experience. The food was excellent and we were very happy with our visit.

Try the set of 4-5 different local beers, a very good experience. We also appreciated the live band playing somber music in the background as well as the ambience.

Definitely recommended.

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for sharing such an outstanding review! You touched on many of the unique aspects of our award winning restaurant, Bizou.  Iconic building coupled with a culinary experience that will create loyalty beyond reason. 

It was our pleasure to serve.

Eat well!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Ridiculous
data.text:
My wife and I had dinner here with a friend (the friend was visiting from out of town).  The experience was bad and totally unacceptable.
We experienced slow service even though the restaurant was about 10% occupied.  The waiter brought us a completely incorrect entree from one that we ordered.  The manager acknowledged the incorrect entree, she verbally apologized, and yet our bill reflected no change whatsoever.  Our friend had a professional time-line that could not be avoided, so we did not have time to send anything back.  If I had the time I would have made a far greater issue, but instead I got to eat something that I didn't order and I got to pay for it in full.  Needless to say I will never return.  What a horrible way to treat patrons.........give them the wrong thing and charge 100%.

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to review. Certainly not the norm and apologize for the experience. Was able to follow up with our team and all intentions were in place to resolve given time. Would be happy to make this right. Please contact me personally at the hotel. It was our pleasure to have you.

Eat well!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Buzz
data.text: Lots of energy in this place. Creative drinks and good food. The service is a bit spotty but not awful.

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your experience! We love creating a buzz through our mixology and live music. Many great changes to come in the near future. Please follow us on social media to stay tuned with the latest!

Eat well!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very disappointed
data.text: I love French cuisine and the ambience that it embraces. I tried Bizou since it was rated so highly, but realized very quickly that it was over rated. First of all, it's entirely too dark and barely has any French decor. The music is so quiet that you can't even tell if it is French music at all. The food is mediocre at best and extremely over priced for what you receive. I'm leaving here having paid way too much and still hungry. Won't be back.

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to review! I apologize for not exceeding the expectation. We are in the process of a re-fresh for a concept that focuses more on our history and a menu that is more diverse. Please follow us on social media to stay tuned for the latest and of course, reach out to me personally as I would love to meet you and have you back.

Eat well!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A Terrific Bar, Brassarie and Restaurant
data.text: In Hotel 4 days, loved atmosphere of second floor bar My wife and I really enjoyed stopping in the busy bar after returning from other events in city.  Good crowd, live music

It was our pleasure to serve you!

data.title: as expected
data.text: We stayed at the Le Meridian for two nights while visiting Tampa. Because of this, we had breakfast here, and after concert snacks. The hotel caters to business travelers and weddings, so the food and price point reflect this. We were disappointed that the food did not meet the high expectations set by menu descriptions. Not bad mind you, just average...at a resort price point. Next time we will stay and dine elsewhere.

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to share. Exceeding the expectation is the goal and great news to share regarding our award winning Bizou! Coming soon, we will be refreshing the concept to focus on more of the courthouse/prohibition history with great menus and price points. Follow us on social media to stay tuned and look forward to showcasing on your next visit.

Eat well!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.text:
* Good food

data.title: Good service; so-so food and decor
data.text: The snapper was decent, the chocolate torte excellent.  But the decor is shabby and scratched up - definitely not up to snuff for the hotel.  Time for a reboot!

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your review! Great news to share as we are addressing some cosmetic items along with some great changes!

Be sure to follow us on social media to keep up.

Eat well!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Exceptional food
data.text:
Had an opportunity to come to Bizou for dinner and I must say, the food was definitely exceptional. I did like the ambiance, dim lighting and background music was not overwhelming. Great conversation over a glass of wine and great food.

I did notice some reviews about service levels. While our experience was good, it wasn't "great". They are almost there but not fully. You can also see the wear and tear on the tables. Need a bit of upkeep.

But if we happen to be in the area again, we would return. If you're in the area and are interested in really good food, this is a good option.

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and you future loyalty. We value all feedback and appreciate the kind words. Great news as many exciting changes coming for Bizou to include tabletops! Follow us on social media to stay up to date.

Eat well!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Unhappy Experience
data.text: We'd heard unfavorable things about this restaurant, but wanted to see the hotel (Le Meridian in downtown Tampa), so we sat at the bar for drinks and an appetizer on our way to another restaurant. (The restaurant and bar menu at Bizou are the same.)The dinning room had only two tables of customers at 7 PM on a Saturday night, so that should have been a clue. The bar fared a bit better, but no one else seemed to be eating -- just drinking. Pleasant service from the friendly bartender did not make up for oily, rubbery escargot that tasted like they had been microwaved, then crowned with a pre-fab puff pastry. Perhaps it is unfair to judge a restaurant from one dish, but this little foray set us back $43 with tip for one barely edible appetizer and two glasses of wine, so I can assure you we will not be returning. We then went on to dine at the very fine Anise Gastrobar, which I plan to review next.

owner_response.author: Scarbro-GM, General Manager at Bizou Brasserie, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Not the goal, not the norm! Each dish, every guest, the experience needs to be great. Thank you for taking the time to review. Great news to share regarding Bizou in the near future that will be announced so please follow us on social media to stay tuned for the exciting changes to all.  Feel free to reach out to me next time you are in the area. Look forward to seeing you soon.

Eat well!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
